prompt: [SCENE] Ayla and Rex accidentally meet in a hidden rooftop garden, neon lights creating a romantic atmosphere. Both are off-duty, vulnerable, without their usual armor. [CONTINUITY] Ayla's signature outfit but relaxed, Rex without his corporate suit, same city skyline but softer lighting. [CAMERA/LIGHT] 35mm lens, high contrast, shallow depth of field, soft neon glow creating intimate shadows. [DISALLOW] no text, no watermark, no logos.

[SCENE] They sit on the edge of the building, talking cautiously. Ayla's holo-computer shows encrypted messages, Rex's corporate badge glints in the neon light. [CONTINUITY] Both characters in relaxed versions of their outfits, city skyline visible, intimate lighting. [CAMERA/LIGHT] 35mm lens, high contrast, shallow DOF, close-up shots with neon backlighting. [DISALLOW] no text, no watermark, no logos.

[SCENE] Ayla reveals a secret about the city's AI system, Rex shares his corporate doubts. Their hands almost touch as they lean over the holo-display. [CONTINUITY] Same relaxed outfits, intimate setting, soft neon lighting. [CAMERA/LIGHT] 35mm lens, high contrast, shallow DOF, romantic lighting with neon accents. [DISALLOW] no text, no watermark, no logos.

[SCENE] They stand up, moving together in a slow dance as the city's neon lights pulse around them. Ayla's cybernetic enhancements glow softly, Rex's corporate implants respond. [CONTINUITY] Same outfits, romantic setting, synchronized neon lighting. [CAMERA/LIGHT] 35mm lens, high contrast, shallow DOF, dynamic lighting from pulsing neon. [DISALLOW] no text, no watermark, no logos.

[SCENE] Rex's corporate comm beeps, breaking the moment. He looks conflicted, torn between duty and newfound feelings. Ayla steps back, her defenses returning. [CONTINUITY] Same outfits, romantic setting interrupted, lighting becomes harsher. [CAMERA/LIGHT] 35mm lens, high contrast, shallow DOF, dramatic lighting shift. [DISALLOW] no text, no watermark, no logos.

[SCENE] They part ways, but both look back with longing. The neon lights seem to dim as they walk in opposite directions. [CONTINUITY] Same outfits, romantic setting ending, melancholic lighting. [CAMERA/LIGHT] 35mm lens, high contrast, shallow DOF, soft shadows and neon glow. [DISALLOW] no text, no watermark, no logos.

[SCENE] Rex in his office, staring at Ayla's encrypted file on his screen. His corporate loyalty battles with his heart. [CONTINUITY] Rex in corporate suit, office setting, harsh corporate lighting. [CAMERA/LIGHT] 35mm lens, high contrast, shallow DOF, cold corporate lighting. [DISALLOW] no text, no watermark, no logos.

[SCENE] Ayla in her hideout, reviewing Rex's corporate data. She realizes he's not the enemy she thought. Her cybernetic enhancements pulse with determination. [CONTINUITY] Ayla in her signature outfit, hideout setting, neon lighting. [CAMERA/LIGHT] 35mm lens, high contrast, shallow DOF, neon glow lighting. [DISALLOW] no text, no watermark, no logos.

[SCENE] They meet again at the same rooftop garden, this time with understanding. The neon lights create a heart-shaped glow around them as they embrace. [CONTINUITY] Same relaxed outfits, romantic setting, heart-shaped neon lighting. [CAMERA/LIGHT] 35mm lens, high contrast, shallow DOF, romantic neon lighting. [DISALLOW] no text, no watermark, no logos.
